extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiPresence Instances
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade FortiPresence instances to version 2.0.0 or above to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Apply Fortinet April 2023 Vulnerability Advisories
extracted_playbook.description: Review the April 2023 Vulnerability Advisories from Fortinet and apply the relevant updates to ensure all known vulnerabilities are addressed.
